name: Crash Zone 3D
description: hi, its me. so yea the game is really buggy and pretty much doesnt work but its in 3d. the cars are purple and pink because bavly said so. i already know whats wrong with the game, so yea lol. um yea controls are pretty much obvious, on the main menu press 1 and 2 cuz the buttons dont actually work XD. but um yea have fun :)
